member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.CanDelete
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports the delete operation.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.CanInsert
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports the insert operation.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.CanPage
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports paging of retrieved data.
member.returns: true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.CanRetrieveTotalRowCount
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.
member.returns: true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.CanSort
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports a sorted view of the retrieved data.
member.returns: true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.CanUpdate
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports the update operation.
member.returns: true if the operation is supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.ContextType
member.summary: Gets the type of the domain context class.
member.returns: The type that is associated with the domain context class specified in the property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the domain context class that contains the field or property specified in the property.
member.returns: The name of the domain context class.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.EnableDelete
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source view supports deleting rows.
member.returns: true if the data source view supports deleting rows; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.EnableInsert
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source view supports adding new rows.
member.returns: true if the view supports inserting rows; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.EnableUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source view supports updating rows.
member.returns: true if the view supports updating rows; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.StoreOriginalValuesInViewState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates that original values from the select operation will be stored in view state when delete or update operations are enabled.
member.returns: true if original values are saved in view state; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Telerik.OpenAccess.Web.OpenAccessLinqDataSourceView.ResourceSetName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a property or field of the domain context class that contains the data collection.
member.returns: The name of the property that represents the data collection.
